Name: dashboard
Overview: <p>Dashboard is just that - a dashboard. It's inspired by SUI and has all the same features as SUI, such as simple customization through JSON-files and a handy search bar to search the internet more efficiently.

Cloudflare Zone ID (Optional).Name: Cloudflare Zone ID (Optional)
Cloudflare Zone ID (Optional).Description: functionality to purge the Cloudflare cache every time the container restarts (though this functionality is entirely optional).

Cloudflare Purge Token (Optional).Name: Cloudflare Purge Token (Optional)
